agent.speaker: agent
agent.text: The origins of modern football codes can be traced back to Western Europe, particularly England. In 1409, King Henry IV of England made one of the earliest documented uses of the English word "football" when he issued a proclamation forbidding the levying of money for "foteball". FIFA acknowledges England as the birthplace of club football. The Football Association, established in 1863 by Ebenezer Cobb Morley, is recognized as the oldest football association, with the first set of football rules being drafted at that time.

contexts.text:
Football
These games and others may well go far back into antiquity . However , the main sources of modern football codes appear to lie in western Europe , especially England .
contexts.title: Football

ml.tokens.model_text: where does soccer football originate from?

contexts.text:
United Kingdom
A 2003 poll found that football is the most popular sport in the United Kingdom . England is recognised by FIFA as the birthplace of club football , and The Football Association is the oldest of its kind , with the rules of football first drafted in 1863 by Ebenezer Cobb Morley . Each of the Home Nations has its own football association , national team and league system . The English top division , the Premier League , is the most watched football league in the world . The first - ever international football match was contested by England and Scotland on 30 November 1872 . England , Scotland , Wales and Northern Ireland compete as separate countries in international competitions . A Great Britain Olympic football team was assembled for the first time to compete in the London 2012 Olympic Games . However , the Scottish , Welsh and Northern Irish football associations declined to participate , fearing that it would undermine their independent status -- a fear confirmed by FIFA . The
contexts.title: United Kingdom

contexts.text:
Football
King Henry IV of England also presented one of the earliest documented uses of the English word `` football '' , in 1409 , when he issued a proclamation forbidding the levying of money for `` foteball '' .
contexts.title: Football

agent.original_text: Association football, commonly known as football or soccer, originated in England in the mid-19th century. It was a evolution of various forms of football that were played in England and Scotland, including rugby football and Gaelic football. The rules of modern football were first codified in 1863 by the Football Association in England. Since then, it has become a global phenomenon and the most popular sport in the world.
